name: 看透以后

name: 爱呀
singer: 金玟岐 - 金玟岐作品集
lyric:
[00:00.00] 作曲 : 金玟岐
[00:01.00] 作词 : 金玟岐
[00:15.82] 制作人/编曲：薛琳可
[00:16.82] 吉他：Jamie Wilson（AUS）
[00:17.82] 贝斯：郑骅骅
[00:18.82] 打击乐：王斌
[00:19.82] 弦乐：中国国家交响乐团
[00:30.82] 想问你还快乐吗
[00:34.45] 却又觉得问候多余了
[00:38.16] 回忆的皱褶
[00:40.52] 已被时间铺平了
[00:45.60] 从前心里的难得
[00:49.24] 怎么忽然挥霍成舍得
[00:52.86] 没有爱的惊心动魄
[00:55.44] 只剩嘴角的洒脱
[01:00.33] 我们的爱呀爱呀
[01:04.87] 好像风中沙
[01:08.63] 轻轻吹过你的手掌
[01:12.24] 却握不住她
[01:15.07] 有时候爱呀爱呀
[01:19.58] 无声的挣扎
[01:23.20] 你在我生命留下喧哗
[01:27.41] 离开后却安静的可怕
[01:53.50] 从前心里的难得
[01:57.64] 怎么忽然挥霍成舍得
[02:01.22] 没有爱的惊心动魄
[02:03.84] 只剩嘴角的洒脱
[02:08.66] 我们的爱呀爱呀
[02:13.20] 好像风中沙
[02:16.94] 轻轻吹过你的手掌
[02:20.65] 却握不住她
[02:23.44] 有时候爱呀爱呀
[02:27.92] 无声的挣扎
[02:31.56] 你在我生命留下喧哗
[02:35.53] 离开后却安静的可怕
[02:41.18] 话来不及说
[02:44.21] 在心里翻滚啊
[02:47.94] 变成感情线的分叉
[02:51.92] 提醒我你来过
[03:00.11] 我们的爱呀爱呀
[03:04.95] 好像风中沙
[03:08.60] 轻轻吹过你的手掌
[03:12.17] 却握不住她
[03:15.31] 有时候爱呀爱呀
[03:19.54] 无声的挣扎
[03:23.30] 你在我生命留下喧哗
[03:27.24] 离开后却安静的可怕
[03:38.04] 那些话就请你忘了吧

name: Closer
lyric:
[00:10.050]Hey, I was doing just fine before I met you
[00:14.480]I drink too much and that's an issue
[00:16.660]But I'm okay
[00:20.120]Hey, you tell your friends it was nice to meet them
[00:24.580]But I hope I never see them again
[00:30.950]I know it breaks your heart
[00:32.690]Moved to the city in a broke down car and
[00:36.180]Four years no call
[00:37.810]Now you're looking pretty in a hotel bar and
[00:40.370]I can't stop
[00:45.140]No, I can't stop
[00:50.240]So baby pull me closer in the backseat of your Rover
[00:54.940]That I know you can't afford
[00:57.440]Bite that tattoo on your shoulder
[00:59.990]Pull the sheets right off the corner
[01:02.400]Of the mattress that you stole
[01:04.940]From your roommate back in Boulder
[01:07.460]We ain't ever getting older
[01:17.680]We ain't ever getting older
[01:27.580]We ain't ever getting older
[01:30.850]You, look as good as the day I met you
[01:35.340]I forget just why I left you, I was insane
[01:40.820]Stay, and play that Blink-182 song
[01:45.440]That we beat to death in Tucson
[01:47.850]OK
[01:51.900]I know it breaks your heart
[01:53.560]Moved to the city in a broke down car and
[01:57.020]Four years no call
[01:58.500]Now I'm looking pretty in a hotel bar and
[02:01.100]I can't stop
[02:05.840]No, I can't stop
[02:10.950]So baby pull me closer in the backseat of your Rover
[02:15.760]That I know you can't afford
[02:18.230]Bite that tattoo on your shoulder
[02:20.800]Pull the sheets right off the corner
[02:23.250]Of the mattress that you stole
[02:25.850]From your roommate back in Boulder
[02:28.250]We ain't ever getting older
[02:38.320]We ain't ever getting older
[02:48.450]We ain't ever getting older
[02:51.350]So baby pull me closer in the backseat of your Rover
[02:56.120]That I know you can't afford
[02:58.700]Bite that tattoo on your shoulder
[03:01.140]Pull the sheets right off the corner
[03:03.650]Of the mattress that you stole
[03:06.160]From your roommate back in Boulder
[03:08.660]We ain't ever getting older
[03:11.280]We ain't ever getting older, no, we ain't ever getting older
[03:39.200]We ain't ever getting older
[03:48.900]No, we ain't ever getting older

name: Shape Of My Heart
lyric:
[00:00.00] 作曲 : Sting/Dominic Miller
[00:01.00] 作词 : Sting/Dominic Miller
[00:23.000]He deals the cards as a meditation
[00:28.550]And those he plays never suspect
[00:35.099]He doesn't play for the money he wins
[00:39.969]He doesn't play for respect
[00:45.609]He deals the cards to find the answer
[00:51.389]The sacred geometery of chance
[00:57.190]The hidden law of a probable outcome
[01:03.199]The numbers lead a dance
[01:08.189]I know that the spades are swords of a soldier
[01:14.089]I know that the clubs are weapons of war
[01:19.769]I know that diamonds mean money for this art
[01:24.719]But that's not the shape of my heart
[01:31.579]He may play the jack of diamonds
[01:37.699]He may lay the queen of spades
[01:42.680]He may conseal a king in his hand
[01:48.569]While the memory of it fades
[01:53.899]I know that the spades are swords of a soldier
[01:59.649]I know that the clubs are weapons of war
[02:05.630]I know that the diamonds mean money for this art
[02:10.649]But that's not the shape of my heart
[02:16.399]But that's not the shape,shape of my heart
[02:52.909]And if i told you that i loved you
[02:58.629]You'd maybe think there's something wrong
[03:03.900]I'm not a man of too many faces
[03:10.169]The mask i wear is one
[03:16.299]Those who speak know nothing
[03:22.500]And find out to their cost
[03:26.778]Like those who curse their luck in too many places
[03:33.028]Are those who fear a lost
[03:38.359]I know that the spades are swords of a soldier
[03:44.149]I know that the clubs are weapons of war
[03:49.709]I know that diamonds mean money for this art
[03:54.778]But that's not the shape of my heart
[04:00.560]But that's not the shape of my heart
[04:06.599]Thats not the shape,shape of my heart

name: 凉城
lyric:
[00:00.00] 作曲 : Xun
[00:00.11] 作词 : 耕耕
[00:00.34]编曲：王柏鸿
[00:00.45]制作人：Xun
[00:00.56]吉他：梁名亿
[00:00.67]和声编写：Xun
[00:00.78]和声：Xun/任然
[00:00.89]录音师：朱鸽
[00:01.21]录音室：Hot Music Studio
[00:01.44]混音师：殇小谨
[00:01.66]混音室：Hot Music Studio
[00:02.67]当海风吹凉霓虹 回首你无影踪 转眼旧盟已成空
[00:09.09]赏夜色千家朦胧 风花雪月如梦 提醒我也曾爱过
[00:17.70]苏州河畔你牵我走过
[00:20.40]外滩的夕阳已在记忆中斑驳
[00:24.78]故事变沉默 被岁月淹没
[00:28.36]思念如我 历经漂泊
[00:31.46]站在雨中目送你穿过那渡口
[00:35.60]离岸的船舶漂走远去的轮廓
[00:39.15]惆怅惹灯火 往事渐落寞
[00:43.21]烟波起落 被遗忘的是我
[00:49.28]当海风吹凉霓虹 回首你无影踪 转眼旧盟已成空
[00:56.55]赏夜色千家朦胧 风花雪月如梦 提醒我也曾爱过
[01:04.33]任眼泪划伤面容 飘浮在情海中 横渡春夏与秋冬
[01:11.64]这城市车水马龙 我心事有谁懂 回忆让人更心痛
[01:19.00]为什么
[01:53.49]十里洋场的繁华依旧
[01:56.51]这幅光景也掩不去我的难过
[02:00.60]曾陪我看过 老街的烟火
[02:04.58]缘分蹉跎 花难结果
[02:07.94]是谁赋颂我宛如月下的芙蓉
[02:11.46]床头留声机暗哑缓慢地诉说
[02:15.03]旗袍它在角落 鞋跟都已断落
[02:18.84]红尘看破 你不再欣赏我
[02:25.81]当海风吹凉霓虹 回首你无影踪 转眼旧盟已成空
[02:32.39]赏夜色千家朦胧 风花雪月如梦 提醒我也曾爱过
[02:40.06]任眼泪划伤面容 飘浮在情海中 横渡春夏与秋冬
[02:47.30]这城市车水马龙 我心事有谁懂 回忆让人更心痛
[02:54.74]当海风吹凉霓虹 回首你无影踪 旧盟转眼都成空
[03:01.92]只剩夜色在朦胧 风花雪月入梦 原来我也曾爱过
[03:09.64]任眼泪划伤面容 沉沦这苦海中 横渡春夏与秋冬
[03:17.14]这城市车水马龙 我心事无人懂 回忆让人更心痛
[03:23.74]凉城中
[03:29.76]不夜城的邂逅未断过
[03:32.28]而你的温柔却早已年久失修
[03:36.55]弄堂诉离愁 苔痕如伤口
[03:40.33]我在那头 等你很久

name: Daisy
lyric:
[by:-南大鸟-]
[00:00.00]Daisy
[00:34.90]静寂を切り裂くよう訪れたのは
[00:40.58]必然としての邂逅僕等の為に
[00:46.23]後悔を嘆く瞳に映る君はそう
[00:51.18]憂いを纏って美しく咲いた
[00:57.84]誰かの生命に溶ける花
[01:02.08]ねぇ君にも見えるだろう
[01:08.12]きっと
[01:11.65]重ねた過ち塗り替えるよう
[01:17.25]何度でもいいさ繰返していくスタートライン
[01:22.91]過去とは違う明日を
[01:28.57]二人だけの希望描くスタートライン
[01:34.53]I never say good bye
[01:38.02]いつだってそうさ
[01:39.87]...
[01:51.16]継続していく証明としての結晶
[01:54.31]仄かに揺れる灯を宿して
[01:57.15]光彩を放つ未来焼付けた
[01:59.95]君の瞳は少し悲しそうで
[02:02.76]Take a look into my eyes
[02:05.46]最後の一滴を拭って
[02:08.42]Every time you wanna see call me
[02:11.12]最初に出会ったあの場所でさ
[02:14.07]散り行く運命に抗って
[02:18.35]そう鮮やかに咲き誇れ
[02:24.36]Always...
[02:27.86]君の詠う声と繋がるよう
[02:33.53]心の奥鳴り響いた僕の音
[02:39.17]祈りに浮かぶ明日は
[02:44.83]生きる意味を希望に変えるから
[02:50.81]I wanna be with you
[02:55.28]二度とは無い今の現実を
[02:58.06]手に入れる為の犠牲なんて
[03:00.49]決して孤独と決別仕切れない
[03:03.33]今の僕に計れない
[03:05.48]それでもいいんだ
[03:07.34]響き渡れ祈りよ
[03:10.09]木霊する僕らの歌声
[03:13.61]一寸の光を描いた
[03:16.18]照らし出す一輪の花よ
[03:19.05]君と二人手を繋いで
[03:22.64]ずっといたいんだ
[03:24.38]...
[03:49.78]重ねた過ち塗り替えるよう
[03:55.39]何度でもいいさ繰返していくスタートライン
[04:01.06]過去とは違う明日を
[04:06.68]二人だけの希望描くスタートライン
[04:12.63]I never say good bye
[04:16.26]いつだってそうさ

name: 恋爱サーキュレーション
lyric:
[00:00.510]せーの
[00:01.340]でもそんなんじゃだめ
[00:03.310]もうそんなんじゃほら
[00:05.370]心(こころ)は進化(しんか)するよ    もっともっと
[00:09.050]
[00:25.360]言葉(ことば)にすれば消(き)えちゃう関係(かんけい)なら
[00:27.850]言葉(ことば)を消(け)せばいいやって
[00:29.570]思(おも)ってた    恐(おそ)れてた
[00:31.270]だけど    あれ？    なんかちがうかも…
[00:33.320]せんりのみちもいっぽから！
[00:35.350]石(いし)のようにかたいそんな意思(いし)で
[00:37.560]ちりもつもればやまとなでしこ？
[00:39.630]「し」抜(ぬ)きで、いや死(し)ぬ気(き)で！
[00:41.080]
[00:41.610]ふわふわり    ふわふわる
[00:44.560]あなたが名前(なまえ)を呼(よ)ぶ    それだけで宙(ちゅう)へ浮(う)かぶ
[00:49.580]ふわふわる    ふわふわり
[00:52.650]あなたが笑(わら)っている    それだけで笑顔(えがお)になる
[00:57.110]
[00:57.510]神様(かみさま)ありがとう    運命(うんめい)のいたずらでも
[01:05.540]めぐり逢(あ)えたことが    しあわせなの
[01:12.490]
[01:13.260]でもそんなじゃだ
[01:15.290]もうそんなんじゃほら
[01:17.350]心(こころ)は進化(しんか)するよ    もっともっと
[01:21.270]そう    そんなんじゃやだ
[01:23.270]ねぇ    そんなんじゃまだ
[01:25.290]私(わたし)のこと見(み)ててね    ずっとずっと
[01:29.020]
[01:31.020]
[01:43.320]
[01:45.320]私(わたし)の中(なか)のあなたほど
[01:46.970]あなたの中(なか)の私(わたし)の存在(そんざい)は
[01:49.430]まだまだ大(おお)きくないこともわかってるけれど
[01:53.230]今(いま)この同(おな)じ瞬間(しゅんかん)
[01:55.250]共有(きょうゆう)してる実感(じっかん)
[01:57.540]ちりもつもればやまとなでしこ！
[01:59.530]略(りゃく)して？    ちりつもやまとなでこ！
[02:01.010]
[02:01.470]くらくらり    くらくらる
[02:04.480]あなたを見上(みあ)げたら    それだけでまぶしすぎて
[02:09.490]くらくらる    くらくらり
[02:12.520]あなたを想(おも)っている    それだけでとけてしまう
[02:16.910]
[02:17.440]神様(かみさま)ありがとう    運命(うんめい)のいたずらでも
[02:25.470]めぐり逢(あ)えたことが     しあわせなの
[02:32.960]
[02:33.480]コイスル    キセツハ    ヨクバリ    circulation
[02:41.480]コイスル    キモチハ    ヨクバリ    circulation
[02:49.480]コイスル    ヒトミハ    ヨクバリ    circulation
[02:57.480]コイスル    オトメハ    ヨクバリ    circulation
[03:05.410]
[03:07.400]ふわふわり    ふわふわる
[03:10.470]あなたが名前(なまえ)を呼(よ)ぶ    それだけで宙(ちゅう)へ浮(う)かぶ
[03:15.400]ふわふわる    ふわふわり
[03:18.420]あなたが笑(わら)っている    それだけで笑顔(えがお)になる
[03:22.990]
[03:23.440]神様(かみさま)ありがとう    運命(うんめい)のいたずらでも
[03:31.400]めぐり逢(あ)えたことが    しあわせなの
[03:41.420]
[03:53.140]

name: Bleeding Love
lyric:
[00:18.280]Closed off from love
[00:21.720]I didn’t need the pain
[00:23.880]Once or twice was enough
[00:26.300]And it was all in vain
[00:28.660]Time starts to pass
[00:31.140]Before you know it you’re frozen
[00:37.210]But something happened
[00:39.350]For the very first time with you
[00:42.040]My heart melts into the ground
[00:44.550]Found something true
[00:47.550]And everyone’s looking round
[00:50.210]Thinking I’m going crazy
[00:56.460]But I don’t care what they say
[00:58.980]I’m in love with you
[01:01.200]They try to pull me away
[01:03.440]But they don’t know the truth
[01:05.480]My heart’s crippled by the vein
[01:08.230]That I keep on closing
[01:11.230]You cut me open and I
[01:15.600]Keep bleeding
[01:17.130]Keep, keep bleeding love
[01:19.610]I keep bleeding
[01:21.500]I keep, keep bleeding love
[01:24.210]Keep bleeding
[01:26.270]Keep, keep bleeding love
[01:29.280]You cut me open
[01:38.210]Trying hard not to hear
[01:41.070]But they talk so loud
[01:42.470]Their piercing sounds fill my ears
[01:44.860]Try to fill me with doubt
[01:47.030]Yet I know that the goal
[01:49.900]Is to keep me from falling
[01:56.220]But nothing’s greater
[01:57.820]Than the rush that comes with your embrace
[02:00.900]And in this world of loneliness
[02:04.130]I see your face
[02:05.920]Yet everyone around me
[02:08.178]Thinks that I’m going crazy, maybe, maybe
[02:15.140]But I don’t care what they say
[02:17.200]I’m in love with you
[02:19.210]They try to pull me away
[02:21.460]But they don’t know the truth
[02:23.880]My heart’s crippled by the vein
[02:26.029]That I keep on closing
[02:29.240]You cut me open and I....
[02:33.350]Keep bleeding
[02:35.200]Keep, keep bleeding love
[02:37.270]I keep bleeding
[02:38.810]I keep, keep bleeding love
[02:41.950]Keep bleeding
[02:44.070]Keep, keep bleeding love
[02:47.000]You cut me open
[02:52.870]And it’s draining all of me
[02:56.020]Oh they find it hard to believe
[03:01.420]I’ll be wearing these scars
[03:04.560]For everyone to see
[03:10.340]I don’t care what they say
[03:12.430]I’m in love with you
[03:14.610]They try to pull me away
[03:16.920]But they don’t know the truth
[03:19.090]My heart’s crippled by the vein
[03:21.650]That I keep on closing
[03:25.300]You cut me open and I....
[03:29.279]Keep bleeding
[03:30.570]Keep, keep bleeding love
[03:33.460]I keep bleeding
[03:35.200]I keep, keep bleeding love
[03:38.100]Keep bleeding
[03:39.460]Keep, keep bleeding love
[03:43.840]You cut me open and I....
[03:47.640]Keep bleeding
[03:48.850]Keep, keep bleeding love
[03:51.800]I keep bleeding
[03:53.290]I keep, keep bleeding love
[03:56.480]Keep bleeding
[03:57.900]Keep, keep bleeding love
[04:02.170]You cut me open and I
[04:06.220]Keep bleeding
[04:08.300]Keep, keep bleeding love

name: Price Tag
lyric:
[00:00.00] 作曲 : Jessie J
[00:01.00] 作词 : Jessie J
[00:11.700]Seems like everybody's got a price,
[00:14.600]I wonder how they sleep at night.
[00:17.900]When the sale comes first
[00:18.750]And the truth comes second,
[00:20.070]Just stop, for a minute and
[00:21.840]Smile
[00:22.860]Why is everybody so serious!
[00:25.610]Acting so damn mysterious
[00:28.700]You got your shades on your eyes
[00:29.580]And your heels so high
[00:30.910]That you can't even have a good time.
[00:33.830]Everybody look to their left （yeah）
[00:36.660]Everybody look to their right （ha）
[00:39.900]Can you feel that （yeah）
[00:40.660]Well pay them with love tonight…
[00:42.640]It's not about the money, money, money
[00:45.450]We don't need your money, money, money
